about.name: Varshith Gudur
about.title: Data & AI Engineer | Co-founder at Docgen
about.description: I'm a passionate Data & AI Engineer with expertise in building intelligent solutions and modern web applications. With a strong foundation in machine learning, data engineering, and full-stack development, I create innovative applications that solve complex real-world problems.

projects.title: Docgen - AI Document Generation
projects.description: An innovative platform that leverages AI to automate document generation, analysis, and processing. Built with advanced NLP models and a scalable cloud architecture.

experience.description: Leading the development of an innovative document generation platform powered by AI. Responsible for the AI architecture, machine learning models, and overall technical strategy.
achievements: Developed proprietary NLP models for intelligent document processing
Built scalable AI infrastructure serving thousands of users
Secured seed funding and grew the technical team from 2 to 8 engineers
Implemented advanced ML pipelines for document analysis and generation

experience.description: Led the development of data-driven solutions and AI applications for enterprise clients across finance, healthcare, and retail sectors.
achievements: Architected and deployed ML models improving prediction accuracy by 35%
Built end-to-end data pipelines processing 5TB+ of data daily
Implemented computer vision solutions reducing manual inspection time by 70%
Mentored junior data scientists and engineers on best practices

experience.description: Developed and maintained data infrastructure and analytics solutions for clients across various industries.
achievements: Built ETL pipelines and data warehousing solutions for business intelligence
Implemented real-time analytics dashboards using streaming data
Optimized database queries reducing processing time by 60%

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, GPA 9.0/10.0
